name: Tailscale
long_description: Tailscale is a zero-config VPN that securely connects your containers and devices. It enables easy, encrypted networking without any manual setup. Add the parameter '--network' and '--ip' to extra_params, to deploy the container to a certain network. Make sure to adjust 'tailscale_extra_params' according to your specific use case.
cmds: docker run -d --name ${name} --hostname docker-${name} -e TS_AUTHKEY=${TS_AUTHKEY} --privileged --device /dev/net/tun -v ${name}-tailscale:/var/lib/tailscale ${extra_params} debian:13 bash -c "apt-get update -y; apt-get install -y curl tmux; curl -fsSL https://tailscale.com/install.sh | sh; tmux new -d -s tailscale tailscaled; sleep 2; tailscale up --authkey '${TS_AUTHKEY}' ${tailscale_extra_params}; ${cmd}"
